an2.195-199:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing two qualities, one dwells happily. What two? (95) Non-anger and non-hostility … (96) Non-denigration and non-insolence … (97) Non-envy and non-miserliness … (98) Non-deceitfulness and non-craftiness … (99) Moral shame and moral dread. Possessing these two qualities, one dwells happily."
